hero.tagline: In Real Estate, We Think Differently
hero.subtitle: Curated luxury homes with white-glove service

about.title: Our Story
about.story1: At ALL IN, real estate isn't just about property. It's about people, moments, and decisions that shape lives.
about.story2: We built something different. Not a brokerage. Not an agency. But a space where people feel safe to think clearly — and choose boldly.
about.story3: Every deal begins with a question: 'What do you really need right now?' And ends only when the answer feels deeply right — financially and emotionally.

fares.name: Fares Jabbour
fares.title: Founder | Strategic Advisor & Asset Specialist
fares.quote: I'm not here to close fast. I'm here to make sure it feels right.
fares.bio: Fares is the heart of ALL IN's mindset. With years of experience, sharp emotional intelligence, and a calm energy that grounds clients — he ensures every deal feels human, not rushed.

ward.name: Ward Jabbour
ward.title: Operations Lead | Client Journey Manager
ward.quote: I don't show properties. I show up for people.
ward.bio: Ward is the structure, the rhythm, and the reassurance. He manages timelines, filters pressure, and makes sure every client moves through the process with clarity.

quotes.text: They didn't just offer me options. They helped me figure out what I actually want.
quotes.author: Daniel R.

quotes.text: I wasn't sold to. I was seen. That changed everything.
quotes.author: Haneen M.

quotes.text: ALL IN didn't just list my property. They turned it into a story buyers wanted to be part of.

quotes.text: I never felt pushed. Just heard. And that made all the difference.
quotes.author: Ahmed T.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: At ALL IN Real Estate, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website and services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect the following types of information:
collect.item1: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and contact details
collect.item2: Property Preferences: Your property search criteria, budget, and location preferences
collect.item3: Transaction Data: Details about properties you've viewed, inquired about, or purchased
collect.item4: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies
collect.item5: Communication Records: Emails, messages, and consultation notes

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.item1: To provide real estate services and property recommendations
use.item2: To communicate with you about properties, consultations, and appointments
use.item3: To improve our website, services, and user experience
use.item4: To send marketing communications (with your consent)
use.item5: To comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:
sharing.item1: Service providers who assist us (e.g., email services, analytics tools)
sharing.item2: Legal authorities when required by law
sharing.item3: Professional partners (lawyers, notaries) involved in your transaction, with your consent

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and restricted access to sensitive data.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Access: You can request a copy of your personal data
rights.item2: Correction: You can update or correct inaccurate information
rights.item3: Deletion: You can request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
rights.item4: Objection: You can object to certain uses of your data, including marketing

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using the ALL IN Real Estate website, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.text: ALL IN Real Estate provides luxury real estate brokerage services, including property sales, purchases, rentals, land investments, and consultation services in Nof HaGalil and surrounding areas.

listings.title: Property Listings Disclaimer
listings.text: All property information is provided in good faith and is believed to be accurate. However, we do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or availability of any listing. Prices, specifications, and availability are subject to change without notice.

conduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
conduct.item1: Using the website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
conduct.item2: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
conduct.item3: Uploading malicious software or harmful content

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, videos, and designs, is the property of ALL IN Real Estate and protected by copyright law. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.text: ALL IN Real Estate is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services. We provide information 'as is' without warranties of any kind.

law.title: Governing Law
law.text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the State of Israel. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Israel.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation, language preferences, and security.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.text: We use analytics cookies (such as Google Analytics) to understand how visitors interact with our website, which pages are most popular, and how we can improve user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.text: These cookies track your browsing activity to show you relevant advertisements on social media platforms and other websites.

thirdparty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdparty.item1: Google Analytics: For website traffic analysis
thirdparty.item2: Facebook Pixel: For targeted advertising on Facebook and Instagram
thirdparty.item3: Social Media Widgets: For sharing content on social platforms

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.text: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality and your user experience.
